Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Raquel F. Rivas "love music"
Reviews.Content: This phone was perfect for  my daughter. It is exactly what she was looking for. It is in between being high tech and not too basic. It is very user friendly. I highly recommend this phone and this seller.

Reviews.Title: My Favorite Phone of All Time
Reviews.Author: macthescribe
Reviews.Content: I loved my Matrix. It worked perfectly for almost two years. The problem I had was not the phone's fault, but mine. I accidentally broke the cover for the charging port off, and I work in a very dusty pillow factory. Dust got into the port, and it was cheaper to just use my upgrade. I nearly cried when I had to switch. Seriously, best phone ever. The battery was decent. I text constantly, so I had to charge it every 2 days or so. The only complaint I had was that the camera wasn't the greatest. I LOVED the dual slide. I also loved the ability to use the voice recorder to record things for my ringtones. This is the phone that made me a loyal Pantech customer.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC  Phone
Reviews.Author: Enigma
Reviews.Content: Firstly, this phone has some weight to it.  I don't know if it's the slide out QWERTY or what, but it's weight gave me an added sense of security.Secondly, it's sturdy. I can be klutzy. My poor phone has been droped countless amount of times including down stairs and pushed off my desk. Plus it withstood the test of the 3 year old who thought it was a toy.  It has a few scratches, but it still works great.Lastly, I've had alot of phones. I started with the grey ones with the giant battery in the mid-90s and have had almost every type and big name manufacturer around. The Pantech Matrix is by far my favorite.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Sabrina Fritts "Simply~Sabrina"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace the damaged contracted phone. The features work well, intuitive design. She loves the dual slide feature. It didn't come with an owner's manual though.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Sabrina King
Reviews.Content: So I purchased 2 phone and the shipped as expected and appear to be brand new.  I took both phones to AT&T; and they set the phone up in 10 minutes.  The phone are bulky but that is not a major concern of mine.  I text alot so these phones a perfect.

Reviews.Title: Pantech phone
Reviews.Author: Sheila
Reviews.Content: My daughter really loves this phone.  Great deal.  Very sturdy and the camera is better than I expected.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Wish I could return this phone
Reviews.Author: Brenda Moore
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone with the intent of using it with straight talk. I have been able to use it for basic phone calls butthe keys are just too small for texting. Trying to use any of the other functions has been and night mare and I've given up. I would not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect replacement.
Reviews.Author: Terrence J. Campbell
Reviews.Content: An extra always helps! Cheaper than buying insurance! When you drop your old one in a glass of orange juice (happens more often than you'd think) just throw the old one away.

Reviews.Title: Battery cannot keep charge
Reviews.Author: Zareda
Reviews.Content: The phone had a lot of the things I wanted: pretty easy to use among other things and, of course, a keyboard.  But the chargers, and I had more than four, did not work.  I bought several chargers for this phone and the phone was unable to keep the charge and, when charged, did not last more than an hour.  I don't suggest you buy it.

Reviews.Title: Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Dre Leigh
Reviews.Content: I never received the phone. It was pretty much a waste of my money. But it is a good phone that's why I ordered it but sadly I never got it in the mail.

Reviews.Title: Worst purchase on Amazon
Reviews.Author: BxFinest83
Reviews.Content: I received a defective phone!  It was scratched up,  which was something the person who wanted the phone could've dealt with.  But the icing on the cake was that the charger wouldn't even lock into the charger port to charge the phone...when I put the charger in, it was slowly sliding out...SMFH. If I could  rank this any lower... it would be a NEGATIVE MILLION!
